EntryName	RHG27_HUMAN
ProteinName	Rho GTPase-activating protein 27 (CIN85-associated multi-domain-containing Rho GTPase-activating protein 1) (Rho-type GTPase-activating protein 27) (SH3 domain-containing protein 20)
GeneName	ARHGAP27 CAMGAP1 SH3D20 PP905
Length	263
Function	Rho GTPase-activating protein which may be involved in clathrin-mediated endocytosis. GTPase activators for the Rho-type GTPases act by converting them to an inactive GDP-bound state. Has activity toward CDC42 and RAC1 (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Membrane
